name: LD41 - Pufferfish51
description:
A turn based teleporting fish fight with rockets for LD41

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/$78434

I enjoyed making this one with my friend Marthinus Wessels, we both got to learn new things during the jam. win win!

Overview:

The game plays out in phases where the player gets to discard actions. Order actions into a sequence and set directions for them. And then watch the actions play out in sequence.
